resources.string: Manual tracking is the simplest type of tracking mode this app offers. Simply select the "Manual Tracking" option by clicking on the MODE button. After pressing the record button, you can then click on the object that you wish to track, every 3-5 seconds. \n\nUpon each click, the coordinates of the touch will be appended to a .yml data file, along with the time and frame number of the touch. A circle will be overlayed on the touch location*. Along with the recording file, the data file allows for offline tracking using your favourite external tools.

Automatic tracking uses a more advanced technique called "template matching". When selecting this method, the user will be presented with an option to select a template of the image that they wish to track. Upon selecting the template and pressing record, template matching uses a method that searches the entire image frame for the template specified by the user. Upon finding a closest match, a bounding box will be drawn around the location of the detected object*.
